sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-tabs
        centerd
    >
        <v-tab @click="goto('div1')">Div 1</v-tab>
        <v-tab @click="goto('div2')">Div 2</v-tab>
        <v-tab @click="goto('div3')">Div 3</v-tab>
    </v-tabs>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    methods: {
    goto(refName) {
      var element = this.$refs[refName];
      var top = element.offsetTop;

      window.scrollTo(0, top);
    }
  }
}
</script>
